verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yah!<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3050>Yahweh!<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H5650>him,<s%> you servants of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>
you who <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>
<S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yah,<s%> for <S%H3050>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%> Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to his <S%H8034>name,<s%> for that is <S%H5273>pleasant.<s%>
For <S%H3050>Yah<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for <S%H3478>himself;<s%> Israel for his own <S%H5459>possession.<s%>
For I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H1419>great,<s%> that our <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is above all <S%H430>gods.<s%>
Whatever <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2654>pleased,<s%> that he has <S%H6213>done,<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and in <S%H776>earth,<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas<s%> and in all <S%H8415>deeps;<s%>

who causes the <S%H5387>clouds<s%> to <S%H5927>rise<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> who <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H1300>lightnings<s%> with the <S%H4306>rain;<s%> who <S%H3318>brings<s%> forth the <S%H7307>wind<s%> out of his <S%H214>treasuries;<s%>
Who <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal;<s%>
Who <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4714>you,<s%> Egypt, on <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and on all his <S%H5650>servants;<s%>
who <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%>
<S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%>
and <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> for a <S%H5159>heritage,<s%> a <S%H5159>heritage<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
Your <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever;<s%> your <S%H2143>renown,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and have <S%H5162>compassion<s%> on his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
The <S%H6091>idols<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>'s <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
They have <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> but they <S%H1696>can't<s%> speak. They have <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> but they <S%H7200>can't<s%> see.
They have <S%H241>ears,<s%> but they <S%H238>can't<s%> hear; neither is <S%H3426>there<s%> any <S%H7307>breath<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouths.<s%>
Those who <S%H6213>make<s%> them will be like <S%H982>them;<s%> yes, everyone who trusts in them.
<S%H1004>House<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1288>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> <S%H1004>House<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H1288>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%>
<S%H1004>House<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H1288>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> You who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H1288>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> from <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> Who <S%H7931>dwells<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yah!<s%>
